section.section: For "on-premises" unfortified wine, "on premise" fortified wine, or both $15.00
For "off-premises" unfortified wine, "off-premises" fortified wine, or both 10.00

text.section: The tax levied in this section is the tax for the first license issued to a person. The tax for each additional license of the same type issued to that person for the same year is one hundred ten (110) per cent of the base license tax, such increase to apply progressively for each additional license. There shall be no proration of license taxes. (Code 1959 , ยง6-4; Ord. No. 1987-21, ยง5, 7-21-87) State law reference: Related provisions, G.S. 105-113.77.
